languages.text: Когда разведчики достигают зоны выработки, связь прерывается. Связаться с ними вновь не выходит — предположительно, разведчики погибли вследствие активации защитных систем экстракциума.

traits.locale_text: Когда разведчики достигают зоны выработки, связь прерывается. Связаться с ними вновь не выходит — предположительно, разведчики погибли вследствие активации защитных систем экстрактора.

languages.text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.
languages.original_text: Когда разведчики достигают зоны выработки, связь прерывается. Связаться с ними вновь не выходит — предположительно, разведчики погибли вследствие активации защитных систем экстракциума.

traits.locale_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

languages.text: 侦察队才刚刚抵达开采区域，信号就被切断了，无法与侦察队重新取得联系。推测原因，他们应该是被开采站的防御系统消灭了。
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

traits.locale_text: 侦察队才刚刚抵达开采区域，信号就被切断了，无法与侦察队重新取得联系。推测原因，他们应该是被开采站的防御系统消灭了。

languages.text: 偵察隊が抽出区域に到着すると、すぐに通信が切れる。おそらくエキストラチウムの防衛システムによるものであるため、この先は連絡を取ることは叶わないだろう。
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

traits.locale_text: 偵察隊が抽出区域に到着すると、すぐに通信が切れる。おそらくエキストラチウムの防衛システムによるものであるため、この先は連絡を取ることは叶わないだろう。

languages.text: La transmisión se interrumpe en cuanto el equipo de exploración llega a la zona de extracción. Todos los intentos posteriores de contactar con ellos fracasan, presumiblemente porque fueron eliminados por los sistemas de defensa del extractium.
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

traits.locale_text: La transmisión se interrumpe en cuanto el equipo de exploración llega a la zona de extracción. Todos los intentos posteriores de contactar con ellos fracasan, presumiblemente porque fueron eliminados por los sistemas de defensa del extractium.

languages.text: Die Übertragung bricht ab, sobald der Erkundungstrupp das Extraktionsgebiet erreicht. Alle nachfolgenden Kontaktversuche scheitern, mutmaßlich weil sie von den Verteidigungssystemen des Extractiums eliminiert wurden.
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

traits.locale_text: Die Übertragung bricht ab, sobald der Erkundungstrupp das Extraktionsgebiet erreicht. Alle nachfolgenden Kontaktversuche scheitern, mutmaßlich weil sie von den Verteidigungssystemen des Extractiums eliminiert wurden.

languages.text: À peine l'équipe de reconnaissance a-t-elle atteint le site d'extraction que les communications sont coupées. Toutes les tentatives pour rétablir le contact échouent, et vous en déduisez que vos hommes ont probablement été éliminés par les systèmes de défense intégrés à l'extractium.
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.

traits.locale_text: À peine l'équipe de reconnaissance a-t-elle atteint le site d'extraction que les communications sont coupées. Toutes les tentatives pour rétablir le contact échouent, et vous en déduisez que vos hommes ont probablement été éliminés par les systèmes de défense intégrés à l'extractium.

languages.text: Keşif birliği maden bölgesine ulaşır ulaşmaz iletişim kesiliyor. Ardından onlara ulaşmak için gerçekleşen tüm denemeler de başarısız oluyor. Bunun sebebi muhtemelen ayıklayıcının savunma sistemlerinin onları öldürmüş olması.
languages.original_text: The transmission cuts off as soon as the scouting party reaches the extraction zone. All subsequent attempts to contact them fail, presumably because they were eliminated by the extractium's defence systems.
